Verwendung: node 06-analyze-sizing.js [Optionen]

checkUsage.help_message:
I18n Usage Analyzer

Usage: node 04-PrÃ¼fen-usage.js [Optionen]

Optionen:
  --source-dir <dir>     Source directory to scan (default: ./src)
  --i18n-dir <dir>       I18n directory (default: ./src/locales)
  --output-Bericht        Generieren detailed Bericht
  --output-dir <dir>     Output directory for Berichts (default: ./Berichts)
  --help                 Zeigen this help

Examples:
  node 04-PrÃ¼fen-usage.js --output-Bericht
  node 04-PrÃ¼fen-usage.js --source-dir=./app --i18n-dir=./locales
  node 04-PrÃ¼fen-usage.js --output-dir=./Analyse --output-Bericht
